abilities.description: When you use your lab to @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} through careful analysis or experimentation, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to isolate or secure a hazardous specimen, reroll any dice.

When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.9c9ab6a42daa96e0]{Swear an Iron Vow} to undertake a long-term research project (extreme or greater), reroll any dice. When you obtain crucial samples, equipment, or data, mark progress on the quest and take +2 momentum. When you devote extended time to the project in your lab, @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} and add +1. On a hit, mark progress. On a strong hit with a match, mark progress twice. When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.985a5415860a99e9]{Fulfill Your Vow} and score a hit, also mark one box on your discoveries legacy track.
